description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Pacific Tourist. Williams's Illustrated Trans-Continental Guide of travel from the Atlantic to the Pacific Ocean ... With special contributions by ... F. V. Hayden [and others] ... Illustrations by T. Moran, etc" Author: WILLIAMS, Henry T. Contributor: HAYDEN, Ferdinand Vandeveer. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10408.dd.1." Page: 82 Place of Publishing: New York Date of Publishing: 1876 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003933396 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
